overview: A playlist of 11 ecology music videos. The majority of songs are by the late singer-songwriter-poet Walkin' Jim Stoltz who hiked over 28,000 miles through the wilderness. Songs about habitats, rivers, buffalo, pikas, bears, trees, prairie dogs and bugs.
tagline: 11 Catchy Ecology Music Videos for Kids with Animals from Yellowstone and Tetons National Parks
title: A Kid for the Wild
